You’re walking down a sunny street in your neighborhood. A girl is gracefully floating toward you, in a way a drunken penguin would. Passing by, she bumps into you, making you spill your four-dollar coffee. You’re about to yell at her, but suddenly you realize you’re hearing her thoughts. It’s a made-up story, that’s how. This is what she thinks about:
